text: María Baxa (15 April 1946 – 14 November 2019) was a Croatian-born Italian- Serbian movie actress and model.mymovies.it She was born in Osijek, Croatia. She was known for her roles in Sex comedy movies. Her best known roles include: Sex with a Smile II, Deadly Chase and Candido Erotico. Baxa died at her apartment in Belgrade, Serbia on 14 November 2019 at the age of 73.Преминула глумица Марија Бакса ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1946 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Croatian movie actors Category:Italian movie actors Category:Serbian movie actors Category:Italian models
title: María Baxa
